 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קָמַט‎</span>] **verb** ==seize== (Late Hebrew ***id., seize, grasp, press together***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bind together***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎קְמַט‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew; <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***seize, compress***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 2 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּקְמְטֵנִי‎</span> [[Job.16.8|Job 16:8]] ***and thou didst seize me***.

** Pu\`al** ***be snatched*** (untimely)***Perfect*** 3 plural<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קֻמְּטוּ‎</span> [[Job.22.16|Job 22:16]].
